Package edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course

Class Course

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course.Activity
edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course.Course
All Implemented Interfaces:
Conflict, Comparable<Course>
public class Course extends Activity implements Comparable<Course>
Course class that creates a course and sets the course's name, title, section number, credit hours, instructor ID, meeting days, and starting and ending times.
Author:
Fahad Ansari, Niyati Patel, David Martinez, Chirag Sreedhara

  • Constructor Details

    • Course

      public Course(String name, String title, String section, int credits, String instructorId, int enrollmentCap, String meetingDays, int startTime, int endTime)
      Constructs a course with the given name, title, section, credits, instructorId, meetingDays, start time, and end time for the course.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the course
      title - title of the course
      section - section of course
      credits - credit hours for course
      instructorId - instructor's unity id
      enrollmentCap - enrollmentCap for courseRoll
      meetingDays - meeting days for course as series of chars
      startTime - start time for course
      endTime - end time for course
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if course name isnt valid

    • Course

      public Course(String name, String title, String section, int credits, String instructorId, int enrollmentCap, String meetingDays)
      Creates a Course with the given name, title, section, credits, instructorId, and meetingDays for courses that are arranged.
      Parameters:
      name - name of course
      title - title of course
      section - section of course
      credits - credit hours for course
      instructorId - instructor's unity id
      enrollmentCap - enrollmentCap for courseRoll
      meetingDays - meeting days for course as series of chars
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if course name isnt valid

      IllegalArgumentException - if number of digits counter are not the length that the section number should be

    • setMeetingDaysAndTime

      public void setMeetingDaysAndTime(String meetingDays, int startTime, int endTime)
      Sets the Course's meeting days, starting time, and ending time.
      Overrides:
      setMeetingDaysAndTime in class Activity
      Parameters:
      meetingDays - meeting days to set
      startTime - start time to set
      endTime - end time to set
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if meeting days are null or an empty string
      IllegalArgumentException - if meeting days are arranged but the starting and ending times aren't 0.
      IllegalArgumentException - if the letter for the meeting day is not a letter of the a weekday
      IllegalArgumentException - if one day is listed more than once in the meeting days

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Course s)
      Compares this course with the specified course for order. Courses are compared based on their name and section.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Course>
      Parameters:
      s - the Course to compare
      Returns:
      a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this Course is less than, equal to, or greater than the specified Course
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if given course is null
